{"id":1102524902,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1700460903,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1102524902/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Sudoku","memory":"43.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isValidSudoku(char[][] board) {\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < board.length; i++) {\n            for(int j = 0; j < board[0].length; j++) {\n                char ch = board[i][j];\n\n                if(ch == '.') continue;\n\n                if(!checkRowCol(board, i, j)) return false;\n                if(!checkSubMatrix(board, i, j)) return false;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    boolean checkRowCol(char[][] board, int row, int col) {\n\n        // checking row\n        for(int i = 0; i < board.length; i++) {\n            char ch = board[i][col];\n            if(i == row) continue;\n            if(ch == board[row][col]) return false;\n        }\n\n        // checking col\n        for(int i = 0; i < board[0].length; i++) {\n            char ch = board[row][i];\n            if(i == col) continue;\n            if(ch == board[row][col]) return false;\n        }\n\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    boolean checkSubMatrix(char[][] board, int row, int col) {\n\n        int n = row - (row % 3);\n        int m = col - (col % 3);\n\n        for(int i = n; i < n+3; i++) {\n            for(int j = m; j < m+3; j++) {\n\n                char ch = board[i][j];\n                if(i == row && col == j) continue;\n\n                if(ch == board[row][col]) return false;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-sudoku","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
